text: Kamienna () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bystrzyca Kłodzka, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately east of Bystrzyca Kłodzka, south-east of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 90. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Kamienna, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
